reviews.text: 8412 Sterling St STE 100, Irving, TX 75063 Thinking about transforming your backyard? TCP Custom Outdoor Living designs and builds premium outdoor spaces across the Dallas Fort Worth area, including this recent project in Allen. From custom patio covers to full outdoor kitchens, luxury pools, fireplaces, and fire pits, our team handles every detail from design through build. We focus on high quality construction, smart layouts, and long lasting materials that make your space both beautiful and f
"Colin promised a quality, beautiful space and he delivered." "We get nothing but compliments when people walk by." "He answered all my questions and addressed any concern very quickly."

We love our new backyard! TCP Outdoor did an amazing job — the space looks beautiful, functional, and we get so many compliments. Steven and his team were professional, reliable, and delivered exactly what they promised. Highly recommend them to anyone looking to upgrade their outdoor space! Response from the owner a month ago We’re so happy to hear how much you’re enjoying your new backyard! The team enjoyed bringing your outdoor space to life.

TCP helped complete an amazing backyard for us! Great experience from design to completion. Our Project Manager RJ made the process easy and was able to ensure every detail was captured from the designs.
